task.summary: Default task
Initial commit
Working sampleSheetParser function can pull necessary values from the sample sheet for use in report creation
Pulls values from SampleSheet.csv, RunInfo.xml, and GenerateFASTQRunStatistics.xml, and returns a dictionary with all values supplied for all sequenced strains.
Moved run metadata functions to runMetadataOptater and added a call to this module in SPAdesPipeline
Added fileExtractionsProcessing to move and extract .gz files
quakeR exists - it should perform error correction on fastq reads. Hopefully it will soon.
quakeR is functional. Error correction is performed, and metadata from correction is collected. Strains that could not be processed by quake are recorded.
spadesGoUpper now assembles corrected fastq files using SPAdes. It might need a few additions depending on what the outputs look like.
quastR exists. It doesn't do anything yet.
quastR now is functional. Still waiting on the rMLST module to perform rMLST analyses, and find the best reference genome for quast.
Small fixes to metadata dictionary structure and population schemes. quastR now works.
continual improvements - contig files are trimmed to 200bp, and nodes are renamed with the fileName
continual improvements - rMLST can identify alleles. Needs to associate allele profiles with the master list of profiles.
rMLST can determine subtypes. There is an issue with the rMLST scheme, where certain alleles are reported as 'N' in the scheme, where they really look like they should be present.
insert sizes are estimated by lse.py
rMLST finds best reference genome. Pipeline is functional.
GAGE mode doesn't work. Everything else does now.
Pipeline is functional. Still needs some commenting and cleaning up.
Commented and cleaned. Needs a readme.
Few tweaks.
Added calculated depth of coverage
rMLST and referenceGenomes look for folders at a set location in the filesystem rather than within the folder with the files to be processed by the pipeline.
Small changes.
Fixed metadata .
Added proper string manipulations for populating metadata.
Updates all around
Updates all around
More metadata
Minor updates
Added the ability to run on single-end reads

Modified the pipeline to use the json metadata file to get the commands used when running 3rd party software. Additionally, the pipeline now has an accessory script that combines geneSipper (creates fastq files directly from the MiSeq) and the pipeline.
Metadata fixes
Fixed small typo.
Actually fixed typo (I hope).
Actually fixed typo (I hope).

Added the ability to run on single-end reads

Modified the pipeline to use the json metadata file to get the commands used when running 3rd party software. Additionally, the pipeline now has an accessory script that combines geneSipper (creates fastq files directly from the MiSeq) and the pipeline.
Metadata fixes
